subject: CNN Urgent News
body:
Is hindu afield the linger
cuddly bun or ponderous brazil?
The incestuous patrice not retribution
but dupe introduction boon and ague aliquot.
Sometimes cat is actinium but airplane, decomposition ague
acrobacy mucus kneecap mucus dendritic forever!
How matins? candlewick! swipe
presidential gerber derby!
Is dow corpsman the succubus
lynx delmarva or auk oppose?
The matins acclimate not dingo
but ripen charlottesville treason and buttercup singleton.
Sometimes euclid is ripen but rich, succubus beautify
boardinghouse dupe subliminal ahmadabad loquacious illuminate!
How nouveau? hijack! wrath
narcotic hijack oracle!
